Talk46:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Holy moly, kid!<sp:5:1:0> I can't believe ya made it
here when the footing's so slippery!
Talk47:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hmm... Your score didn't wow me,<sp:5:1:0> but I'll
still give ya a little something.
Talk201:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yer pretty good, kid. So good that I'll let
ya try the <clr:0000>extended course<clr:ffff> where you've
got twice as much time to play!
Give it a try sometime. I wanna see what
you can really do!
Talk203:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Ya wanna hear the rules again? <sp:5:0:0>That's
why I like ya, kid. Brawn and brains!

The rules are simple as can be!<sp:5:0:0> Carry the
ball as far as ya can before time runs out!

How do ya carry it? Up ta you! Put it on a
cart, lug it in yer arms, whatever ya want!

Careful though—lose that ball and ya lose
the game!

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>The farther ya take it, the better
yer reward!

And if ya wanna flex yer brain muscles,
the extended course gives ya <clr:0000>more time<clr:ffff>
to go farther still!
Talk204:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Maybe I sprung the extended course on
ya a little too early, kid... <sp:5:0:0>But I know you
can do better!
Talk205:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I knew ya had it in ya! But there's still
higher heights ta shoot for and better
records ta set!
But until ya do, here's a little somethin'
from me!
Talk206:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>I-I can't believe what I just saw! Ya
carried that orb clean into next week!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>You're well on yer way ta bein' the best
ball hauler of all!
Talk12: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Now we're rollin'! OK, get to your mark!
Talk101:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Uh, kid? The startin' spot is right here in
front of me. Takin' the ball too far away
is just askin' for trouble.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Carry that ball like it's never been
carried before!
Talk102:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Painful_01>Hm? Ya lost the ball? Aww, sorry, kid,
but that's game over.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Ya wanna hear the rules again? That's
why I like ya, kid. Brawn and brains!

The rules are simple. <sp:5:0:0>Carry the ball as far
as ya can before time runs out.

How ya carry it is up to you. Put it on a
cart, lug it in yer arms, whatever works.

Careful though—lose that ball and ya lose
the game!

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>The farther ya take it, the better yer
reward! So make sure ya hustle.
Talk103:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What the—<sp:5:0:0> Did ya really break the ball?!<sp:5:1:0>
Sorry, but that's the end of the game.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Take yer time! The readier ya get, the
better you'll do!
Talk104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Don't tell me ya threw the ball away...<sp:5:1:0>
Sorry, but that's game over.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Oh, really?<sp:5:1:0> Well, all right. I'll give ya yer
rupees back, so come on by if the mood
strikes ya.
Talk105:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oops.<sp:5:0:0> No puttin' the ball away now!<sp:5:1:0>
Hate ta tell ya, but that's game over.
Talk17: <sp:3:0:2:0700>So, you ready for the thrill of a lifetime?
Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If ya decide ya wanna give it another go,
come on back.
Talk106:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:CallFar_01>Hey, kid!<sp:5:1:0> It's against the rules ta move
the ball that far away before I say go!<sp:0:4:0>Back to your starting spots!
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hmmm...<sp:5:1:0> C'mon, kid, I know ya can take
it farther than that! I wanna give ya a
reward, but ya gotta earn it!
Talk107:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>What the—<sp:5:0:0> Did ya really break the ball?!<sp:5:1:0>
Gimme a bit to set things back up...
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There ya go! <sp:5:0:0>That's pretty good, kid!<sp:5:1:0> Bet
ya can do even better next time too!
Talk108:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Don't tell me ya threw the ball away...<sp:5:1:0>
Gimme a minute to set back up.
Talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Amazing! Ya got that ball far!<sp:5:1:0> I knew you
were special, kid.
Talk109:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oops.<sp:5:0:0> No puttin' the ball away now!<sp:5:1:0>
Gimme a minute to set back up.
Talk38:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That was a ball haul fer the ages.
Now here, this is for you!
Talk39: <sp:3:0:2:0700>If ya wanna play again, gimme a shout!
Talk210:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wow!<sp:5:0:0> Now that's a score!<sp:5:1:0> You lookin' ta
go pro at this, kid?
Talk211:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Whoaaa!<sp:5:1:0> I can't believe what I'm seein'!<sp:5:1:0>
If this is a dream, I don't wanna wake up!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>What a record, kid... I don't even have the
words. <sp:5:0:0>Future ball-haulers will be talkin'
about what ya did here for generations!
Talk212:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ya made me believe in miracles today.
I wanna give ya something special, but
I can only do it once.<sp:5:1:0> Here!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>That must mean ya got a hankerin' fer
<clr:0000>Ultra Ball Haul<clr:ffff>! Am I right?
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>What's with the blank stare?<sp:5:0:0> Ya never
heard of the super-popular, habit-forming
Ultra Ball Haul?!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I guess that figures, since I'm the only
one who's ever played it! Thought it up
all on my lonesome.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The rules are simple.<sp:5:0:0> Carry the ball as far
as ya can before time runs out.

It's up to you how ya carry it. Put it on a
cart, lug it in yer arms, whatever works.

Careful though—lose that ball and ya lose
the game!

But the farther ya take it, the better yer
reward! So make sure ya hustle.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, how about it? You wanna give the ol'
<clr:0000>Ultra Ball Haul<clr:ffff> a shot?
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All right! I'll get the ball, so just gimme
a holler when yer ready!
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hm? What's the story, kid? You callin'
it quits?
Talk110:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Whoa!<sp:5:1:0> You sent that ball so far, we can't
even see it anymore!<sp:0:4:0>Didn't think that'd happen...<sp:5:1:0> Sorry ta say
it, but that's game over.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ya sure?<sp:5:0:0> Aw, that's no good!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But if ya ever change yer mind, come
find me. I'll be here.
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I see...<sp:5:0:0> Well, if that's what yer heart says,
I'm not about ta stop ya.
Talk111:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Man, oh man.<sp:5:0:0> You're full of surprises, kid.
<sp:5:1:0>How'd ya pull that off?<sp:0:4:0>Well, I'll record your score up ta when
we lost sight of the ball.
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's the way! It'll cost ya
<clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>, OK?
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now yer talkin'! <sp:5:0:0>Give it all ya got, and
take that ball far!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You don't have enough rupees...<sp:5:1:0> Oh, kid.
Save up yer money so you can play!
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If ya quit now, I can't give ya yer
<clr:0000>20 rupees <clr:ffff>back. Are ya sure?
Talk41: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Wanna give Ultra Ball Haul another go?
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>No foolin'? That's too bad.<sp:5:1:0> But if ya ever
wanna play, ya know where ta find me!
Talk42: <sp:3:0:2:0101>How 'bout it? Ready ta haul another ball?
Talk106_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:CallFar_01>Hey, kid!<sp:5:1:0> Where ya goin'?!<sp:5:1:0> Ya got
somewhere else ta be?<sp:0:4:0>If ya wanna stop the game,<sp:5:0:0> lemme know!
Talk43:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Holy moly, kid! <sp:5:1:0>If ya got to the bottom of
this valley, you must have legs of iron
and guts of steel!
Talk44:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey there, kid!<sp:5:1:0> Hard not to sleep in on a
nice mornin' like this!
Talk45:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey there, kid!<sp:5:1:0> Makin' it here this late
takes guts, gusto, and gumption!
